description: Create a new artifact with the specified attributes.

inputs.description: Container which the artifact will be added to.
inputs.name: container

inputs.description: The name of the new artifact, which is optional and defaults to "artifact".
inputs.name: name

inputs.description: The label of the new artifact, which is optional and defaults to "events"
inputs.name: label

inputs.description: The severity of the new artifact, which is optional and defaults to "Medium". Typically this is either "High", "Medium", or "Low".
inputs.name: severity

inputs.description: The name of the CEF field to populate in the artifact, such as "destinationAddress" or "sourceDnsDomain". Required only if cef_value is provided.
inputs.name: cef_field

inputs.description: The value of the CEF field to populate in the artifact, such as the IP address, domain name, or file hash. Required only if cef_field is provided.
inputs.name: cef_value

inputs.description: The CEF data type of the data in cef_value. For example, this could be "ip", "hash", or "domain". Optional.
inputs.name: cef_data_type

inputs.description: A comma-separated list of tags to apply to the created artifact, which is optional.
inputs.name: tags

inputs.description: Either "true" or "false", depending on whether or not the new artifact should trigger the execution of any playbooks that are set to active on the label of the container the artifact will be added to. Optional and defaults to "false".
inputs.name: run_automation

inputs.description: Optional parameter to modify any extra attributes of the artifact. Input_json will be merged with other inputs. In the event of a conflict, input_json will take precedence.
inputs.name: input_json

outputs.description: The ID of the created artifact.
